story_14_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You and your Pokémon make the best sync pair
around! Just fantastic!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
We lost... But...for some reason, I don’t really feel
all that bad about it.
story_14_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
That must be because you gave it everything 
you had! You did great, Bugsy!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: You and Beedrill were both really cool!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Hey, Viola...
Can I ask you a favor?
story_14_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’d love something to remember this battle by...
Do you think you could take a photo of me and
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Pleeease?
story_14_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
What a fantastic idea!
How about it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_14_03000/2401_0401_0900_10: OK, everybody get in the frame!
story_14_03000/2401_0402_1100_10:
What a lovely subject you are!
OK, everybody get in the frame!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
All right, I got the perfect shot of your smiling
faces. That expression looks good on you, Bugsy!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
You’re probably right. I’m really glad we got
to battle each other today!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You made me want to learn even more
about Bug-type Pokémon!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
That sort of got me thinking, actually!
There are tons of other Trainers here on Pasio
that use Bug-type Pokémon like me...
story_14_03000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Now is the perfect time to go out and find
them all. It’s my chance to study how they
battle with their Pokémon!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Fantastic idea, Bugsy! And...maybe I could go
along with [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_14_03000/2401_1001_1900_10:
The way you made Bugsy’s face light up like that
was so lovely, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_14_03000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I think if I hang around you, I’ll be able to take
tons of pictures of smiling Trainers and Pokémon!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
How about it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Can I join your team? Pretty please!
story_14_03000/2401_0402_2500_10:
Woo-hoo! Wait... That does mean yes, right?
I’m looking forward to being a part of your team!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_2600_10: Well, I guess it’s good-bye for now, Bugsy.
story_14_03000/2401_1001_2700_10:
I guess so. But I hope we get to team up
together again someday!
story_14_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
Oh, that tearful look in your eyes at the thought of
leaving my side! Fantastic! Just fantastic!
